document.full_text: silver tumbled before finding a footing on tuesday, dragging prices of gold and oil with it and subduing european shares, although investors were wary of taking strong positions ahead of a u.s. federal reserve policy meeting.
document.title: silver slide ripples out, fed in focus
lines_and_colors: silver tumbled before finding a footing on tuesday, dragging prices of gold and oil with it and subduing european shares, although investors were wary of taking strong positions ahead of a u.s. federal reserve policy meeting.
